page.title: 12HOPE AND CAERGWRLE 1985
page.content:
The final part of this account of Hope and Caergwrle deals with aspects of life in 1985 as experienced by 11 year old pupils at Castell Alun High School, Hope.
My house is made of new brick. It is ten years old. We moved in when it was first built. It has got a front and side garden and a yard at the back. It has got ivy growing up the front and has had three extensions. It has got fourteen rooms with four bedrooms, three toilets, a television room, a utility room, a shower room and normal rooms that are in any house. {(Housing)}
